name: Pond Scum (LetsDoWhatever)
description:
Pond Scum is a Prototype FPS using grapple mechanics, increase your score by navigating the pond to shoot targets. You play as a frog, extending the tongue to reach high areas. With your trusty gun you can take down any threats in the pond.

Escape Key - Quit Game

E - Grapple

Left Mouse Click - Shoot

WASD - General Movement

Space Key -Jump
